name: Flowfinity Wireless Inc.
tag_list: mobile-enterprise-apps, mobile-forms, workflow-automation, workflow-automation-software, business-process-automation, enterprise-mobility
overview:
Flowfinity provides a proven, fully customizable solution for building mobile enterprise apps without programming.

Since 2000, Flowfinity has helped leading companies across industries empower their mobile workforces in order to enhance productivity, engage management, and improve business insight through all areas of the organization.

By making it easy and fast to mobilize day-to-day business processes on tablets and smartphones, Flowfinity enables mobile teams to access, report, and share information when and where they need to. Top global brands in CPG and other industries rely on Flowfinity software as the standard technology for automating critical business processes.
